nodes.title: Create the window
nodes.content:
wn = turtle.Screen()
wn.title("Snake Game by @TokyoEdTech")
wn.bgcolor("green")
wn.setup(width=600, height=600)
wn.tracer(0)  # Turns off the screen updates

nodes.title: Draw the snake's head at 0,0
nodes.content:
head = turtle.Turtle()
head.speed(0)
head.shape("square")
head.color("black")
head.penup()
head.goto(0, 0)
head.direction = "stop"

nodes.title: go up
nodes.content: if the snake is not going down, go up

nodes.title: go down
nodes.content: if the snake is not going up, go down

nodes.title: go left
nodes.content: if the snake is not going right, go left

nodes.title: go right
nodes.content: if the snake is not going left, go right

nodes.title: move head based on it's direction
nodes.content: move the snake's head 1 block in the direction it's facing
